title: DropX
description: dropX.io API provides programmatic access to the e-commerce intelligence data.

fields.api_key: authentication header should be in header

actions.title: products.link_search.get
actions.description: Returns list of e-commerce product that are close to the one provided -- one from each provider

url.description: URL must be a url encoded value

providers.description: A valid e commerce website link(eg. www.flipkart.com or http://www.amazon.in) by a ',' seperated values to filter response by required e-commerce providers

actions.title: products.link_search_v2.get
actions.description: Returns list of e-commerce product that are close to the one provided -- one from each provider

url.description: URL must be a url encoded value

providers.description: A valid e commerce website link(eg. www.flipkart.com or http://www.amazon.in) by a ',' seperated values to filter response by required e-commerce providers

actions.title: products.search.get
actions.description: Returns one unique result from every provider that dropx.io tracks

term.description: search terms giving any title of products that are sold online

providers.description: A valid e commerce website link(eg. www.flipkart.com or http://www.amazon.in) by a ',' seperated values to filter response by required e-commerce providers

actions.title: products.search_v2.get
actions.description: Returns one unique result from every provider that dropx.io tracks

term.description: search terms giving any title of products that are sold online

providers.description: A valid e commerce website link(eg. www.flipkart.com or http://www.amazon.in) by a ',' seperated values to filter response by required e-commerce providers

term.description: search terms giving any title of products that are sold online
